values: 竞赛；赛跑；速度比赛；竞争；角逐；人种；种；种族；民族；管道；通道；滑道；赛道；轨迹；<机>（滚珠轴承的）座圈；滚道；血统；家系；（动植物的）属；赛马会；<古>（日、月的）行程；历程；命数；（水、潮的）急流；冲势；势头；急流；水道；沟渠；沟槽；<空>滑流；螺桨尾流；同道；同流
（和…）比赛；参加比赛；（因害怕、兴奋而）急速跳动；快速移动；疾走；全速行进；竞相；赶（时间）；（发动机）猛转

synonym.mean: 属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门弟

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 生动的；保持原味的；适于赛跑的；猥亵的
种族主义，种族歧视；人种偏见

word_mean_info__list.difference: 专指有共同祖先和相同肤色、面部特征等遗传特征以及共同风俗等的人群。
侧重指由有共同文化、社会基础而所形成的人民整体。
特指居住于同一区域，有共同历史、语言、文化及心理素质等的人类群体。
强调小跑时上下弹跳的动作，是介于跑与走之间轻快的快速运动。
最普通用词，指由于各种原因而急速奔跑。
多用于赛跑，指以最快速度奔跑。

word_group.brief_definition: 激烈竞争；你死我活的竞争
划船比赛；脸；脸蛋；牛津剑桥划船比赛
只有一匹马独占优势的赛马

bilingual.source: Who was the first in the race?
I didn't land first in the race.
bilingual.target: 我在比赛中没有第一个到达。

bilingual.source: There were many animals in that race.
bilingual.target: 那场比赛中有很多动物。

bilingual.source: It was an unexpected end to the race.
bilingual.target: 这是比赛意想不到的结局。

bilingual.source: A crowd of 30,000 people watch the race each year.
bilingual.target: 每年有三万人观看比赛。

bilingual.source: Alex had a race with his father and Max.
bilingual.target: 艾利克斯和他的父亲及马克斯比赛。

bilingual.source: But John refuses to race without his brother.
bilingual.target: 但约翰拒绝在没有他兄弟的情况下比赛。

list.abstract: race（英文：rapid-amplification of cDNA ends，全称：cDNA末端快速扩增技术）是指通过PCR进行cDNA末端快速克隆的技术。该项技术是由Frohman等于1988年发明。 race是基于PCR技术基础上由已知的一段cDNA片段，通过往两端延伸扩增从而获得完整的3'端和5'端的方法。
《Race》是一部由金露丽编剧，郑允浩主演的电视剧。

yingyinNormal.en: Who cares about this stupid race anyway? Right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁会在乎这个破比赛啊，对不对?

yingyinNormal.en: Let's have a race. Yes! Ready, steady, go!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来比赛吧。好的，准备？坐稳了，开始!

yingyinNormal.en: What's so important about this race of yours, anyway?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么这个比赛对你来说这么重要？

yingyinNormal.en: How important a race is it? It's very important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个比赛很重要是不是。是的，非常重要。

yingyinNormal.en: How important a race is it? It's very important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个比赛很重要是不是。是的，非常重要。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing here? You're gonna miss your race.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还呆在这里干什么？你会错过你的比赛的

yingyinNormal.en: The next race is the relay. Each child needs to pick a parent to race. Peppa, pick me, pick me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一个比赛项目是接力赛。小朋友都要和爸爸妈妈一起比赛。选我，选我，选我。

yingyinNormal.en: We are going to have a race on our bikes. Peppa, do you want to race too? Okay, as long as we race down the hill. Okay. Peppa and her friends are going to race down the hill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要进行骑自行车比赛。佩奇，你想要参加比赛吗？好的，只要我们是骑车下坡就行。好的。佩奇和她的朋友们要骑车下坡了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. I'll race you. And me. And me. I want to race too. Where's your racing car, Peppa? I don't have a racing car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇！我要和你比赛。还有我，还有我。我也想比赛。你的赛车在哪里，佩奇？我没有赛车。

yingyinNormal.en: We are going to win the race. Hooray! Peppa and George are the winners.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要赢得比赛了，太好了。佩奇和乔治赢得了比赛。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we wouldn't want him to miss that race of his.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可不想让他错过那个比赛。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, George, you've stopped tidying up. You'll lose the race. Oh, yes, the race. Come on, George, put this back on the bookshelf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，乔治，你们怎么不整理了呀？比赛你们要输了哦.噢，是的。还有比赛。快点，乔治。把书放回书架上。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, George, you've stopped tidying up. You'll lose the race. Oh, yes, the race. Come on, George, put this back on the bookshelf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，乔治，你们怎么不整理了呀？比赛你们要输了哦.噢，是的。还有比赛。快点，乔治。把书放回书架上。

yingyinNormal.en: The race was almost finished. Switch it back on. Wow, that was an exciting and rare race. I'm so glad I didn't miss the finish. See, it's finished.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个比赛刚刚马上就要结束了。重新打开！哇，真是一个激动的赛车比赛。我好开心我没有错过结尾。看，这个结束了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not just a race. We're talking about the Piston Cup!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不仅仅是一场比赛，我们是在说活塞杯啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Let's see who can get back first, we'll have a race. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们看看谁先回去，我们来比赛吧！好的！

yingyinNormal.en: Is that right? Then why don't we just have a little race? Me and you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？要不我们来个比赛怎么样？就我们两个

yingyinNormal.en: Before the race can begin, you need to be made aware of one little thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是当比赛开始前，你们要弄清楚一件小事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Go, George go. Oh, dear. George is now at the back of the race.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加油！乔治，加油！哦，天哪，乔治现在落后所有比赛的人了。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry, Peppa. Race you! Peppa and her friends are racing to Daddy Pig's pumpkin! Hey! Watch out for my pumpkin! Hurray!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，佩琪。比赛开始！佩琪和朋友们比赛 谁能最快骑到南瓜那儿。小心我的南瓜！好的！

exam_freq_info.chinese: 种; 属; 科; 类

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 人种的；种族的；民族的；种族差异引起的；与种族差异有关的

word_family.mean: n. 速度比赛；竞赛；急流；沟槽；管道；通道；人种；种族；民族；姜根

sense_info_list.en: take part in a contest of speed

examination_example.sentence: Parkrun is not a <highlight>race</highlight> but a time trial: Your only competitor is the clock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Parkrun（公园跑）不是比赛，而是计时赛:你唯一的竞争对手是时钟。

examination_example.sentence: Can We Win the <highlight>Race</highlight> Against Machines?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们能赢得与机器的竞赛吗？

examination_example.sentence: We need to reframe <highlight>race</highlight> against the machine as <highlight>race</highlight> with the machine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要把“人机对抗”重构为“人机结合”。

sense_info_list.en: any one of the groups that human beings can be divided into based on shared distinctive physical traits

examination_example.sentence: Anti-immigrant sentiment typically increases, as does conflict between <highlight>races</highlight> and classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反移民的情绪尤其高涨，同时种族和阶级矛盾也变得更加剧烈。

examination_example.sentence: Ease conflicts between <highlight>races</highlight> and classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 缓解种族和阶级之间的冲突。

examination_example.sentence: Whole new realms of understanding — from gender to <highlight>race</highlight> to cultural studies — were opened up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们开辟了理解（历史）的全新领域——从性别到种族再到文化研究。

sense_info_list.en: go, move, function, or drive at top speed

examination_example.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else on the socially perpetuated "<highlight>race</highlight> to the finish line,".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会上永远持续着一种在“冲向终点的比赛”中落后于其他人的恐惧。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person's heart or pulse)beat faster than usual because of fear or excitement

examination_example.sentence: You might feel your heart <highlight>racing</highlight> or your face turning red.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会感到心跳加速或脸变红。

sense_info_list.en: a breed or type of animal or plant
sense_info_list.zh: 种; 属; 科; 类

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 激烈竞争；你死我活的竞争

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 种族主义；人种优劣论；种族歧视；种族偏见；种族对抗
adj. 人种的；种族的；民族的；种族差异引起的；与种族差异有关的

word_family.mean: n. 速度比赛；竞赛；急流；沟槽；管道；通道；人种；种族；民族；姜根

sense_info_list.en: any one of the groups that human beings can be divided into based on shared distinctive physical traits

examination_example.sentence: It can reveal information about protected characteristics like age, <highlight>race</highlight>, nationality, disability, gender, religion, etc., and that could bias a hiring decision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以揭示关于受保护特征的信息，如年龄、种族、国籍、残疾、性别、宗教等，这可能会影响招聘决定。

examination_example.sentence: Millions of Marconi's contemporaries had the same class, gender, <highlight>race</highlight>, and colonial privilege as he, but only a handful did anything with it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与Marconi同时代的数百万人拥有与他相同的阶级、性别、种族和殖民特权，但只有少数的人能够利用这些特权。

examination_example.sentence: Evidence has shown they develop own-<highlight>race</highlight> bias from as young as three months of age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有证据表明，他们从3个月大的时候就开始产生自己的种族偏见。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a contest of speed
go, move, function, or drive at top speed

word_usage.usage: race指种族整体概念时是不可数名词，指一个具体的种族时是可数名词。
race作“（速度）比赛”时，常与介词against、with连用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 急速跳动; 快速转动

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 参赛者；赛车；赛艇；遊蛇；转台；参赛选手；T背的
n. 种族主义；人种优劣论；种族歧视；种族偏见；种族对抗
adj. 人种的；种族的；民族的；种族差异引起的；与种族差异有关的

word_family.mean: n. 速度比赛；竞赛；急流；沟槽；管道；通道；人种；种族；民族；姜根

sense_info_list.en: take part in a contest of speed

examination_example.sentence: It is a seven-day <highlight>race</highlight>, called the Iditarod Trail and participants stop at Takotna for their obligatory 24-hour rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一场为期七天的比赛，名为“伊蒂塔罗德小径”，参赛者必须在塔科特纳停下来休息24小时。

examination_example.sentence: The toughness of the <highlight>race</highlight> allows for racers to eat pretty much whatever they want.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比赛的激烈程度使得参赛者几乎可以想吃什么就吃什么。

examination_example.sentence: They consume the pies as stomach warming <highlight>race</highlight> fuel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把馅饼当成比赛用的暖胃燃料。

sense_info_list.en: any one of the groups that human beings can be divided into based on shared distinctive physical traits

examination_example.sentence: People from different <highlight>races</highlight>, genders, and regions all suffer from a lack of financial security.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自不同种族、性别和地区的人都缺乏经济保障。

examination_example.sentence: Those external factors include the difficulties accompanying low-wage work or structural discrimination based on <highlight>race</highlight>, gender, or ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些外部因素包括低工资工作所带来的困难或基于种族、性别或能力的结构性歧视。

examination_example.sentence: Doing so will send an important message to the nation's youngest citizens: Whatever your <highlight>race</highlight> or ethnicity, you matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样做将向这个国家最年轻的公民传递一个重要的信息：无论你是什么种族，你都很重要。

sense_info_list.zh: 急速跳动; 快速转动

examination_example.sentence: You're cold, but your heart is <highlight>racing</highlight> as if a killer just chased you down a dark street.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你很冷，但你的心在跳动，就好像一个杀手在黑暗的街道上追赶你一样。

examination_example.sentence: Physical symptoms include a <highlight>racing</highlight> heart or struggling to catch breath.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生理症状包括心跳加速和呼吸困难。

sense_info_list.en: go; move; function; or drive at top speed

word_usage.usage: race指种族整体概念时是不可数名词，指一个具体的种族时是可数名词。
race作“（速度）比赛”时，常与介词against、with连用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 急速发展; 快速移动
人种; 种族; 民族

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 人种的；种族的；民族的；种族差异引起的；与种族差异有关的

word_family.mean: n. 速度比赛；竞赛；急流；沟槽；管道；通道；人种；种族；民族；姜根

sense_info_list.en: take part in a contest of speed

examination_example.sentence: A Cross-Country Running <highlight>Race</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一场越野跑比赛

examination_example.sentence: Depending on the kind of <highlight>race</highlight> you plan to enter, you can set up a timetable for the remaining weeks before the <highlight>race</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据你计划参加的比赛类型，你可以在比赛前为剩下的几周制定一个时间表。

sense_info_list.en: If something races towards a particular state or position, it moves very fast towards that state or position.
sense_info_list.zh: 急速发展; 快速移动

examination_example.sentence: My brother, of course, <highlight>raced</highlight> off to be with his friends, while I had plenty to do myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，我哥哥跑去和他的朋友们待在一起，而我自己有很多事情要做。

sense_info_list.zh: 人种; 种族; 民族

examination_example.sentence: We will see that social factors (因素) like gender, <highlight>race</highlight>, and class do not determine the appearance of genius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会发现，社会因素（比如性别，种族和阶级）并不能决定天才的出现。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 快速移动; 快速运转

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 速度比赛；竞赛；急流；沟槽；管道；通道；人种；种族；民族；姜根

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 划船比赛；脸；脸蛋；牛津剑桥划船比赛

sense_info_list.en: take part in a contest of speed

examination_example.sentence: He was happy because he won the <highlight>race</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他很高兴，因为他赢得了比赛。

examination_example.sentence: Every year in China, thousands of people watch dragon boat <highlight>races</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，每年都有成千上万的人观看龙舟比赛。

examination_example.sentence: Ever since then, he has not run in any more <highlight>races</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，他再也没有参加任何比赛。

examination_example.sentence: The most important thing is to win the <highlight>race</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是赢得比赛。

examination_example.sentence: All of them had prepared themselves for this important <highlight>race</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们都为这场重要的比赛做好了准备。

examination_example.sentence: Who is leading the 5G patent <highlight>race</highlight>？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁在引领5G专利竞赛？

sense_info_list.zh: 快速移动; 快速运转

examination_example.sentence: I was running around, <highlight>racing</highlight> to get a table ready for the waiting customers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我跑来跑去，抢着为等待的顾客准备一张桌子。

examination_example.sentence: I would wake up in the morning and it was like my heart was <highlight>racing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会在早上醒来，就好像我的心在狂跳。

examination_example.sentence: Her heart was beating wildly and her mind <highlight>raced</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的心在狂跳，她的思绪在狂奔。

word_usage.usage: race指种族整体概念时是不可数名词，指一个具体的种族时是可数名词。
race作“（速度）比赛”时，常与介词against、with连用。
